001.comments: NOTE: Lighting practicum, consult instructor. Priority will be given to BFA Design/Production and BA Theatre majors. IF THIS COURSE IS FULL OR BLOCKED PLEASE SIGN UP FOR THE WAITLIST SECTION: THTR 299L - WL1. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/
